description: Provides information about the specified custom vocabulary filter. To get a list of your custom vocabulary filters, use the operation.

parameters.name: VocabularyFilterName
parameters.description: The name of the custom vocabulary filter you want information about. Custom vocabulary filter names are case sensitive.

nested_items.name: VocabularyFilterName
nested_items.description: The name of the custom vocabulary filter you requested information about.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: The language code you selected for your custom vocabulary filter.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the specified custom vocabulary filter was last modified.

nested_items.name: DownloadUri
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 location where the custom vocabulary filter is stored; use this URI to view or download the custom vocabulary filter.
